movie.title: Dilwale
movie.description_intro: Raj is a Mafia member. One day he meets a girl (Meera) while being chased by his rival gang and falls in love with her. Later he finds out that this girl is the daughter of the leader of his rival gang. Yet their love story continues until he was shot by his girlfriend upon a deep misunderstanding. After that incident these two lovers live separate until their siblings fall in love. With this new love story their paths intertwines again.
movie.description_full: Raj is a Mafia member. One day he meets a girl (Meera) while being chased by his rival gang and falls in love with her. After that incident these two lovers live separate until their siblings fall in love. With this new love story their paths intertwines again.

movies.title: Truth or Consequences
movies.summary: A speculative documentary about a small desert town in southern New Mexico. Set in a near-future when humans are leaving Earth for other planets, the film tells the story of the people who stayed.
movies.description_full: A speculative documentary about a small desert town in southern New Mexico. Set in a near-future when humans are leaving Earth for other planets, the film tells the story of the people who stayed.

movies.title: I Still Believe
movies.summary: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.
movies.description_full: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.
movies.synopsis: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.

movies.title: No Panic, with a Hint of Hysteria
movies.title_english: No Panic, with a Hint of Hysteria
movies.title_long: No Panic, with a Hint of Hysteria (2016)
movies.summary: A timid accountant tries to earn his living as a rather unsuccessful hitman, until an accidental killing of a mobster makes him a target for the vengeful mafia boss, murderous gangsters, trigger-happy cops and the dead man's psychotic wife - and if he's not careful his own wife might catch wind of his double life too.
movies.description_full: A timid accountant tries to earn his living as a rather unsuccessful hitman, until an accidental killing of a mobster makes him a target for the vengeful mafia boss, murderous gangsters, trigger-happy cops and the dead man's psychotic wife - and if he's not careful his own wife might catch wind of his double life too.
movies.synopsis: A timid accountant tries to earn his living as a rather unsuccessful hitman, until an accidental killing of a mobster makes him a target for the vengeful mafia boss, murderous gangsters, trigger-happy cops and the dead man's psychotic wife - and if he's not careful his own wife might catch wind of his double life too.

movies.title: Bend of the River
movies.summary: Two men with questionable pasts, Glyn McLyntock and his friend Cole, lead a wagon-train load of homesteaders from Missouri to the Oregon territory. They establish a settlement outside of Portland and as winter nears, it is necessary for McLyntock and Cole to rescue and deliver food and supplies being held in Portland by corrupt officials. On the trip back to the settlement, up river and over a mountain, Cole engineers a mutiny to divert the supplies to a gold mining camp for a handsome profit.

On the trip back to the settlement, up river and over a mountain, Cole engineers a mutiny to divert the supplies to a gold mining camp for a handsome profit.
